title: Blended Learning Design for Practical Subjects: VR and Real-Time Webinar Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning course for pre-service teachers to train in practical skills needed in real classroom settings, focusing on language subjects with VR and live webinars to expand physical space.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design and operate virtual language learning environments (e.g., museums, cultural spaces) using VR technology
Effectively guiding language education activities by applying practice-oriented teaching methods in real-time webinars
Comparing and evaluating integration strategies of physical spaces and digital tools in blended learning design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
